languages.text: {n}Скверна, зародившаяся в вас в день смерти Теодоры, откликается. Слова Зари будто гипнотизируют, перед вашим внутренним взором разворачиваются картины окутанного пламенем мира, в котором, нетронутые огнем, скитаются бормочущие безглазые призраки, а шепоты демонов складываются в резонанс и заставляют дрожать обугленную твердь.{/n}

{n}The corruption that was born within you on the day of Theodora's death answers the call. Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of daemons resonate together to shake the scorched rock below.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Скверна, зародившаяся в вас в день смерти Теодоры, откликается. Слова Зари будто гипнотизируют, перед вашим внутренним взором разворачиваются картины окутанного пламенем мира, в котором, нетронутые огнем, скитаются бормочущие безглазые призраки, а шепоты демонов складываются в резонанс и заставляют дрожать обугленную твердь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The corruption that was born within you on the day of Theodora's death answers the call. Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of demons resonate together to make the scorched rock below shake.{/n}

Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of daemons resonate together to shake the scorched rock below.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Korruption, die am Tag von Theodoras Tod in dir geboren wurde, antwortet dem Ruf. Auroras Worte scheinen dich zu verzaubern. Vor deinem geistigen Auge entstehen Visionen einer in Flammen gehüllten Welt, durch die murmelnde, augenlose Geister wandern, vom Feuer unberührt. Das kollektive Geflüster der Dämonen hat eine solche Resonanz, dass der verbrannte Fels unter ihren Füßen erzittert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corruption that was born within you on the day of Theodora's death answers the call. Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of daemons resonate together to shake the scorched rock below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Korruption, die am Tag von Theodoras Tod in dir geboren wurde, antwortet dem Ruf. Auroras Worte scheinen dich zu verzaubern. Vor deinem geistigen Auge entstehen Visionen einer in Flammen gehüllten Welt, durch die murmelnde, augenlose Geister wandern, vom Feuer unberührt. Das kollektive Geflüster der Dämonen hat eine solche Resonanz, dass der verbrannte Fels unter ihren Füßen erzittert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La corruption née en vous le jour de la mort de Théodora répond à l'appel... Les paroles d'Aurore semblent vous envoûter, évoquant dans votre esprit la vision d'un monde en proie aux flammes, où résonnent non seulement les chuchotements de fantômes errants et aveugles, mais aussi les murmures de démons qui tentent d'unir leurs voix pour faire trembler la roche brûlée en contrebas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corruption that was born within you on the day of Theodora's death answers the call. Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of daemons resonate together to shake the scorched rock below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La corruption née en vous le jour de la mort de Théodora répond à l'appel... Les paroles d'Aurore semblent vous envoûter, évoquant dans votre esprit la vision d'un monde en proie aux flammes, où résonnent non seulement les chuchotements de fantômes errants et aveugles, mais aussi les murmures de démons qui tentent d'unir leurs voix pour faire trembler la roche brûlée en contrebas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}西奥多拉被害那天，腐化植入了你的心中。此刻，你体内的腐化响应了‘极光’的呼唤。她的话语似乎产生了催眠的效果，你脑海中浮现出被熊熊烈焰所吞没的世界，无眼的鬼魂在火中不断徘徊，喃喃自语。恶魔的低语声与鬼魂的声音交杂在一起，往复回荡。在这和声之中，你脚下烧焦的岩石不住地震颤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corruption that was born within you on the day of Theodora's death answers the call. Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of daemons resonate together to shake the scorched rock below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}西奥多拉被害那天，腐化植入了你的心中。此刻，你体内的腐化响应了‘极光’的呼唤。她的话语似乎产生了催眠的效果，你脑海中浮现出被熊熊烈焰所吞没的世界，无眼的鬼魂在火中不断徘徊，喃喃自语。恶魔的低语声与鬼魂的声音交杂在一起，往复回荡。在这和声之中，你脚下烧焦的岩石不住地震颤。{/n}

languages.text: {n}シオドーラが死んだ日にあなたの中に生まれた腐敗が、その呼びかけに応える。オーロラの言葉に心を支配されのか、心の目には炎に包まれた惑星のビジョンが浮かび上がる。そこでは、目のない幽霊が何かを呟きながら歩き回り、その体を火が避けている。ディーモンの囁く声が共鳴して、足元の焦げた岩を震わせていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corruption that was born within you on the day of Theodora's death answers the call. Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of daemons resonate together to shake the scorched rock below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}シオドーラが死んだ日にあなたの中に生まれた腐敗が、その呼びかけに応える。オーロラの言葉に心を支配されたようで、心の目には炎に包まれた惑星のビジョンが浮かび上がった。そこでは、目のない幽霊が何かを呟きながら歩き回り、その体を火が避けている。ディーモンの囁く声が共鳴して、足元の焦げた岩を震わせていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La corrupción que nació en tu interior el día de la muerte de Theodora responde a la llamada. Las palabras de Aurora parecen hipnotizarte, evocando visiones en tu mente de un mundo envuelto en llamas en el que murmuran fantasmas que vagan sin ojos, intactos por el fuego, y los susurros de los daemons resuenan al unísono para hacer temblar la roca calcinada que hay debajo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corruption that was born within you on the day of Theodora's death answers the call. Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of daemons resonate together to shake the scorched rock below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La corrupción que nació en tu interior el día de la muerte de Theodora responde a la llamada. Las palabras de Aurora parecen hipnotizarte, evocando visiones en tu mente de un mundo envuelto en llamas en el que murmuran fantasmas que vagan sin ojos, intactos por el fuego, y los susurros de los daemons resuenan al unísono para hacer temblar la roca calcinada que hay debajo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Theodora'nın öldüğü gün içine yerleşen yozluk tohumları, çağrıya cevap veriyor. Aurora'nın sözleri, seni âdeta büyülüyor. Alevler içindeki bir dünyanın görüleri, zihin gözünü işgal ediyor: Alevlerin dokunamadığı, gözsüz, mırıldanan hayaletler dünyayı arşınlarken iblislerin fısıltıları hep bir ağızdan yankılanarak altındaki kavrulmuş kayayı kökünden sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The corruption that was born within you on the day of Theodora's death answers the call. Aurora's words seem to mesmerise you, conjuring visions in your mind's eye of a flame-engulfed world in which muttering eyeless ghosts wander about, untouched by fire, and the whispers of daemons resonate together to shake the scorched rock below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora'nın öldüğü gün içine yerleşen yozlaşma tohumları, çağrıya cevap veriyor. Aurora'nın sözleri, seni âdeta büyülüyor. Alevler içindeki bir dünyanın görüleri, zihin gözünü işgal ediyor: Alevlerin dokunamadığı, gözsüz, mırıldanan hayaletler dünyayı arşınlarken iblislerin fısıltıları, aşağıdaki kavrulmuş kayayı yerinden oynatıyor.{/n}
